summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingTake your hair from flat to fab with Batiste Volumizing Dry Shampoo. Batiste Volumizing Dry Shampoo is specially formulated with talc & silica which absorb oil while volumizing hair.
details: DetailsBenefitsWorld's #1 dry shampooUse between washes to instantly refresh your hair, no water requiredThis waterless formula absorbs dirt and grease to revitalize dull and lifeless hair - now with keratinRemoves oil from roots while giving hair show-stopping volumeEnjoy scents of grapefruit, rose and amberAdds VolumeFormulated WithoutColorItem 2543630How To UseShake well. Hold can 10-12 inches from dry hair, section, and spray onto roots. Massage thoroughly with fingertips to ensure roots are fully covered. Brush through to remove excess residue and style as desired.Precautions: Extremely flammable aerosol. Keep away from heat/sparks/ open flames/hot surfaces - No smoking. Do not spray on open flame or other ignition sources. Pressurized container. May burst if heated. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50 degrees Celsius/122 degrees Fahrenheit. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating or inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Not for intimate hygiene use. Avoid spraying in eyes. Discontinue use if skin/scalp irritation occurs. Discontinue use if skin/scalp irritation occurs. Seek medical attention if irritation persists. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsButane, Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Talc, Silica Distearyldimonium Chloride, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Cetrimonium Chloride.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake well. Hold can 10-12 inches from dry hair, section, and spray onto roots. Massage thoroughly with fingertips to ensure roots are fully covered. Brush through to remove excess residue and style as desired.Precautions: Extremely flammable aerosol. Keep away from heat/sparks/ open flames/hot surfaces - No smoking. Do not spray on open flame or other ignition sources. Pressurized container. May burst if heated. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50 degrees Celsius/122 degrees Fahrenheit. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating or inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Not for intimate hygiene use. Avoid spraying in eyes. Discontinue use if skin/scalp irritation occurs. Discontinue use if skin/scalp irritation occurs. Seek medical attention if irritation persists. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Asthma Attack
reviews.comments:
I haven't had an asthma attack in years but this caused one. 

When I try new products I always turn on the exhaust fan, keep doors open, and don't use in small spaces…but it didn't matter with this. I'll never be annoyed with my husband again for putting my emergency inhaler in my purse.

reviews.headline: Very Effective, but a lot of residue
reviews.comments: So let me say that this is the only dry shampoo I've ever used that truly does not require very much to get rid of the oily look. It also smells great and yes, it gives you volume. However, it leaves a definite residue and makes your hair hard to brush. I dont mind it because it requires so little and I even use less on consecutive days because its so good at getting rid of oil. and if you want your hair to stay a certain way, its pretty good for that. Overall, I'm buying this again and it may be my new go-to. Especially considering how little you need in comparison to others. Just be aware of the texture it gives.

reviews.headline: The volumizing in this dry shampoo is real.
reviews.comments: My thick hair, when straightened, remains clean for approximately four days; this dry shampoo is delightfully fragrant and effectively restores volume.

reviews.headline: good but not great
reviews.comments: the white chalky residue is diabolical

reviews.headline: Instant Love
reviews.comments: I have very fine hair and most dry shampoos will help with the oil, but it doesn't help with how limp my hair still looks on days I don't wash it. This one is great, though. I was surprised and impressed with how much volume it gave me, like I have more hair than I really do! The formula reminds me of some volume powders I've tried (the kind that have that slight tackiness, if that makes sense) so if you use this one, you really have to make sure you hold the can far enough away as you spray the sections of hair because it doesn't take much.

reviews.headline: Wanted to love
reviews.comments: Love batiste so much but this just makes my hair stiff, sticky, difficult to brush. Smells amazing but have to wash my hair immediately after. Doesnt do a whole lot of volume for me either

reviews.headline: So much volume!
reviews.comments: I have dark hair and this does leave a white cast but can be patted out.  I like the volume this creates and adds a nice texture feel.

reviews.headline: I've been buying Batiste for many years
reviews.comments: Batiste is so affordable and they keep developing new focuses dry shampoo products.The volumizing dry shampoo did not disappoint by giving me an extra day without shampooing. It did not seem heavy on my thick hair. It has a clean fragrance to it.

reviews.headline: Repeat Buy
reviews.comments: I love this stuff. It's the only one I buy anymore. I have repeatedly bought it 5 times after finding it.

reviews.headline: Perfect for thin/oily bangs
reviews.comments: I use this on my no hair wash days on my bangs and front hair pieces and use a velcro curler after for a bit. When i brush it out after it looks super healthy and volumized!! the only downside is how intense it is so when youre rubbing it in make sure to be gentle so you don't knot your hair.

reviews.headline: Great Product!
reviews.comments: Love this product. It works fast and gives me volume that lasts all day! Will be my go-to.

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: Batiste has the best dry shampoo from the drugstore for sure. And the volumizing one really does add a good amount of volume! I love using it when i'm done styling for an extra boost of body

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Smells good and works great!

reviews.headline: yes
reviews.comments: This is one of the better ones!

reviews.headline: Liked it at first…
reviews.comments: It was good in the beginning, although it was always easy to overdo it. I liked it before I found something way better. Feels gritty on scalp and can make my hair look stiff in a bad way in comparison.

reviews.headline: I will never purchase this product again.
reviews.comments: Hair becomes extremely greasy 2 days after using the dry shampoo . I literally used 2 pumps and had to wash my hair thrice in order to get rid of the residue . Also , there was abnormal hair fall after 2 washes . Do not recommend!!

reviews.headline: Works, but the ingredients made my head numb & gave my aches
reviews.comments: So the plus side is that this dry shampoo works great. The down side is that the ingredients of butane, isobutane and propane gave me major side effects. Numb scalp and headaches all began after using this product.  Will find a cleaner product.

reviews.headline: Makes my hair fresh again!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite from Batiste, the scent is fainter than their barely their scent (I was looking for a weak scented dry shampoo that isn't overpowering/overwhelming). It refreshes my hair and in my opinion the best dry shampoo from Batiste.

reviews.headline: Very volumizing!
reviews.comments: I love trying all of Batiste's dry shampoos! Dry shampoo in general has saved me a lot of money because I can go three days without washing my hair instead of every other day. The volumizing DS is my favorite because it is very volumizing. What I like doing is spraying it in my roots then blow drying it. After I'm done, it looks like I got a blow out at the salon. My hair also gets oily fast and like always, this DP did a good job at hiding it.

reviews.headline: The bottle is 3.8 oz, not the 4.2 advertised
reviews.comments: Scam- do not buy

Makes your hair look freshly washed and volume!

Leaves a light covering, blends into hair
Makes your hair look freshly washed and volume!
Use for volume everyday even on clean hair

faceoff_positive.comments: This is the best product for people with thin flat hair--a couple of sprays and my hair actually has volume, sometimes even too much. And as a nice bonus it works so well as a dry shampoo--takes all of the oil out of your hair and makes hair look just washed fresh.
faceoff_positive.headline: This is the best...

faceoff_negative.comments: I really love the Batiste original dry shampoo, so when I saw they carried a product specifically for volume, I was excited. I've got long hair that's pretty fine - since it weighs itself down, it needs some help in the volume department. Unfortunately, this product was heavy and sticky. It added a ton of texture, but felt stiff, almost like there was clay in my hair. I couldn't wait to wash it out ... which pretty much defeats the purpose of dry shampoo. This product might be great for up dos, but not for wearing my hair down. I still like the original formula much better!
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for my fine hair ...
